LightningComponentBundle.description: View Hierarchy Lists of any self referential objects.

propertyType.name: SO
propertyType.label: Select a Object
propertyType.description: Select a Object to put a record collection of records from the flow that need to show in a hierarchy

property.name: incRecordCollection
property.label: Record Collection
property.description: Collection of records to display in hierarchy

property.name: incObjectAPIName
property.label: Selected Object API Name
property.description: The API name of the object selected.

property.name: relationshipField
property.label: Relationship Field API Name
property.description: Field that defines parent-child relationship (e.g., ParentId)

property.name: titleField
property.label: Title Field API Name
property.description: Field that defines the name of a record

property.name: subTitleField
property.label: Subtitle Field API Name
property.description: Field that defines the subtitle of a record. If blank, subtitle will be hidden.

property.name: settingsJSON
property.label: Other Settings JSON
property.description: This is where other settings can be placed in. Look in the Github documentation for more info.
